segments.text: I think the woman is completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would even care if she saw them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far that he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, completely trusting him not to drop her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this scene is a mix of chaos and innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the stool is wobbling, but the children are happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little sorry for the woman when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s hand is deep in the jar, and he’s not letting go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
